tool_description: This API helps to query realtime Flights prices, Hotels booking, Restaurants, Attracting locations, etc… to create a travelling site like tripadvisor.com
name: Travel Advisor
title: Travel Advisor

api_list.name: flights/create-session (Deprecating)
api_list.description:
* TripAdvisor stops providing "Flights feature" via their mobile application, the web version is going to be down in the future.
Create new session for searching flights tickets of all airlines around the world. The flight APIs need to use as following : Firstly, you init a search session by using the create-session endpoint and get sid value Secondly, you repeatedly call poll endpoint until the summary/c field is true to get final total flight by summary/nr value. o parameter must be 0 otherwise the summary field is not returned. Thirdly, you repeatedly call poll endpoint with o increasing by n value step by step until you reach total flight.

required_parameters.name: o1
required_parameters.description: Airport code of first origin

required_parameters.name: dd1
required_parameters.description: The date of departure from first origin, the format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2020-05-15

required_parameters.name: d1
required_parameters.description: The airport code of first destination location

optional_parameters.name: c
optional_parameters.description: Cabin code, such as 0 - Economy | 1- Business Class | 2 - First Class | 3 - Premium Economy

optional_parameters.name: o2
optional_parameters.description: The airport code of second origin location

optional_parameters.name: d2
optional_parameters.description: The airport code of second destination location

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency code

optional_parameters.name: tc
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma. Ex : 11,5

optional_parameters.name: ts
optional_parameters.description: The number of seniors

optional_parameters.name: ta
optional_parameters.description: The number of adults

api_list.name: airports/search (Deprecating)
api_list.description:
* TripAdvisor stops providing "Flights feature" via their mobile application, the web version is going to be down in the future.
Search for airport code by countries', cities', etc... name

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Name of cities, districts, places, etc...

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: The language code

api_list.name: attractions/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List attractions of specific location by location_id

required_parameters.name: location_id
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id field that returned in locations/search endpoint

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: One of following recommended|ranking

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: min_rating
optional_parameters.description: Rating - Min 3 max 5

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response (max 30)

optional_parameters.name: bookable_first
optional_parameters.description: Book online first

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency code

optional_parameters.name: subcategory
optional_parameters.description: Attraction category - Check for suitable values of filters_v2/filter_sections/filter_groups/options/value field (only one value is allowed at a time) returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of items to ignore for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: lunit
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings km|mi

api_list.name: hotel-filters/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List all available options and filters

required_parameters.name: location_id
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id field that returned in locations/search endpoint

optional_parameters.name: pricesmax
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable price range in filters/prices_slider field returned in hotel-filters/list endpoint. For exmaple : $120 -> 120

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings : asc|desc, this param is used with sort by price

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings : recommended|popularity|price

optional_parameters.name: child_rm_ages
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in all rooms. Ex : 7,10

optional_parameters.name: hotel_class
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value of filters/hotel_class field (separated by comma to filter by multiple values. Ex : 1,2,3) returned in hotel-filters/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: checkin
optional_parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel, the format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2020-05-15

optional_parameters.name: nights
optional_parameters.description: The number of nights to live

optional_parameters.name: amenities
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value of filters/amenities field (separated by comma to filter by multiple values. Ex : beach,bar_lounge,airport_transportation) returned in hotel-filters/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: zff
optional_parameters.description: Hotel Style - Check for suitable value of filters/zff field (separated by comma to filter by multiple values. Ex : 4,6) returned in hotel-filters/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency code

optional_parameters.name: subcategory
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value of filters/subcategory field (separated by comma to filter by multiple values. Ex : hotel,bb,specialty) returned in hotel-filters/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: pricesmin
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable price range in filters/prices_slider field returned in hotel-filters/list endpoint. For exmaple : $120 -> 120

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: rooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of rooms

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description: The number of adults in all rooms

api_list.name: flights/poll (Deprecating)
api_list.description:
* TripAdvisor stops providing "Flights feature" via their mobile application, the web version is going to be down in the future.
Poll for more available flight data until the value of "summary/c" field returned right in this endpoint is true. The flight APIs need to use as following : Firstly, you init a search session by using the create-session endpoint and get sid value Secondly, you repeatedly call poll endpoint until the summary/c field is true to get final total flight by summary/nr value. o parameter must be 0 otherwise the summary field is not returned. Thirdly, you repeatedly call poll endpoint with o increasing by n value step by step until you reach total flight.

required_parameters.name: sid
required_parameters.description: The value of sid returned in flights/create-session endpoint

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency code

optional_parameters.name: mc
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value of "summary/cp" or "summary/ocp" field (separated by comma to specify multiple values) returned in flights/create-session or right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: o
optional_parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging. Use summary/nr field returned in response to get total flights

optional_parameters.name: so
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value of "so" field returned in flights/create-session or right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: ca
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value of "summary/ap" field (separated by comma to specify multiple values) returned in flights/create-session or right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: am
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value of "itineraries/ac" field (separated by comma to specify multiple values) returned in flights/create-session or right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: n
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response (max 15)

optional_parameters.name: ns
optional_parameters.description: One of following NON_STOP | ONE_STOP | TWO_PLUS or separated by comma to specify multiple values

api_list.name: flights/get-booking-url (Deprecating)
api_list.description:
* TripAdvisor stops providing "Flights feature" via their mobile application, the web version is going to be down in the future.
Generate booking url relating to a specific flight

required_parameters.name: searchId
required_parameters.description: The value of search_params/sid field returned in response of .../flights/create-session endpoint. For example : 5aaa20e5-d5c8-4cdd-a657-b6453bb80756.1483

required_parameters.name: Orig
required_parameters.description: Airport code of origin. For example : DMK

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of itineraries/l/id field returned in response of .../flights/poll endpoint. For example : AgodaFlights|1|68

required_parameters.name: searchHash
required_parameters.description: The value of summary/sh field returned in response of .../flights/create-session endpoint. For example : 2188ff0ed4e8e4ee7a50dc32b229e11d

required_parameters.name: Dest
required_parameters.description: Airport code of destination. For example : NYC

optional_parameters.name: impressionId
optional_parameters.description: The value of itineraries/l/impressionId field returned in response of .../flights/poll endpoint. For example : 372e5654-b873-4c26-859b-633c29f7ad84.93175

api_list.description: List hotels by specifying a coordinate and radius

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: Longitude of coordinate

optional_parameters.name: pricesmin
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable price range in filters/prices_slider field returned in hotel-filters/list endpoint. For exmaple : $10 -> 10

optional_parameters.name: checkin
optional_parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel

optional_parameters.name: subcategory
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value of filters/subcategory field (separated by comma to specify multiple values) returned in hotel-filters/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: nights
optional_parameters.description: The number of nights to live

optional_parameters.name: amenities
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value of filters/amenities field (separated by comma to specify multiple values) returned in hotel-filters/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: zff
optional_parameters.description: Hotel Style - Check for suitable value of \\\"filters/zff\\\" field (separated by comma to specify multiple values) returned in hotel-filters/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response (max 30)

optional_parameters.name: hotel_class
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable value of filters/hotel_class field (separated by comma to specify multiple values) returned in hotel-filters/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: pricesmax
optional_parameters.description: Check for suitable price range in filters/prices_slider field returned in hotel-filters/list endpoint. For exmaple : $120 -> 120

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: distance
optional_parameters.description: The radius to look for nearest places

optional_parameters.name: rooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of rooms

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of items to ignore for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency code

optional_parameters.name: child_rm_ages
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in all rooms

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description: The number of adults in all rooms

api_list.name: hotels/get-details (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get all information of hotels

required_parameters.name: location_id
required_parameters.description: The value of location_id field that returned in .../hotels/list... endpoint

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency code

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description: The number of adults in all rooms

optional_parameters.name: rooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of rooms

optional_parameters.name: checkin
optional_parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel

optional_parameters.name: nights
optional_parameters.description: The number of nights to live

optional_parameters.name: child_rm_ages
optional_parameters.description: The age of every children separated by comma in all rooms

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code
